CancelTaskExecution.name: CancelTaskExecution
CancelTaskExecution.description: Cancels execution of a sync task.

CreateAgent.name: CreateAgent
CreateAgent.description: Activates an agent that you have deployed on your host.

CreateLocationEfs.name: CreateLocationEfs
CreateLocationEfs.description: Creates an endpoint for an Amazon EFS file system.

CreateLocationFsxWindows.name: CreateLocationFsxWindows
CreateLocationFsxWindows.description: Creates an endpoint for an Amazon FSx Windows File Server file system.

CreateLocationNfs.name: CreateLocationNfs
CreateLocationNfs.description: Creates an endpoint for a NFS file system.

CreateLocationObjectStorage.name: CreateLocationObjectStorage
CreateLocationObjectStorage.description: Creates an endpoint for a self-managed object storage bucket.

CreateLocationS3.name: CreateLocationS3
CreateLocationS3.description: Creates an endpoint for an Amazon S3 bucket.

CreateLocationSmb.name: CreateLocationSmb
CreateLocationSmb.description: Creates an endpoint for an SMB file system.

DeleteLocation.name: DeleteLocation
DeleteLocation.description: Deletes the configuration of a location used by AWS DataSync.

DescribeAgent.name: DescribeAgent
DescribeAgent.description:
Returns metadata such as name, network interfaces, and the status (that is, whether
                                                the agent is running or not) about a sync agent.

DescribeLocationEfs.name: DescribeLocationEfs
DescribeLocationEfs.description: Returns metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon EFS sync location.

DescribeLocationFsxWindows.name: DescribeLocationFsxWindows
DescribeLocationFsxWindows.description: Returns metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Windows sync location.

DescribeLocationNfs.name: DescribeLocationNfs
DescribeLocationNfs.description: Returns metadata, such as the path information, about a NFS sync location.

DescribeLocationObjectStorage.name: DescribeLocationObjectStorage
DescribeLocationObjectStorage.description: Returns metadata about a self-managed object storage server location.

DescribeLocationS3.name: DescribeLocationS3
DescribeLocationS3.description: Returns metadata, such as bucket name, about an Amazon S3 bucket sync location.

DescribeLocationSmb.name: DescribeLocationSmb
DescribeLocationSmb.description: Returns metadata, such as the path information, about an SMB sync location.

DescribeTask.name: DescribeTask
DescribeTask.description: Returns metadata about a sync task.

DescribeTaskExecution.name: DescribeTaskExecution
DescribeTaskExecution.description: Returns detailed metadata about a sync task that is being executed.

ListAgents.name: ListAgents
ListAgents.description: Returns a list of agents owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request.

ListLocations.name: ListLocations
ListLocations.description: Returns a lists of source and destination sync locations.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: This operation lists the tags that have been added to the specified resource.

ListTaskExecutions.name: ListTaskExecutions
ListTaskExecutions.description: Returns a list of executed sync tasks.

ListTasks.name: ListTasks
ListTasks.description: Returns a list of all the sync tasks.

StartTaskExecution.name: StartTaskExecution
StartTaskExecution.description: Starts a specific invocation of a sync task.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Applies a key-value pair to an AWS resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: This operation removes one or more tags from the specified resource.

UpdateAgent.name: UpdateAgent
UpdateAgent.description: Updates the name of an agent.

UpdateTask.name: UpdateTask
UpdateTask.description: Updates the metadata associated with a sync task.
